0110111110011010 1101010110001100 1 -> sum: 0100010100100111, cout: 1
1111100101011000 1100111011111100 1 -> sum: 1100100001010101, cout: 1
0010000101101011 1110011000110000 1 -> sum: 0000011110011100, cout: 1
0111001010000100 0011001010101110 1 -> sum: 1010010100110011, cout: 0
1001100010101001 1111001101000011 0 -> sum: 1000101111101100, cout: 1
1001011100111011 0100110010001000 0 -> sum: 1110001111000011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
